task.title: Generating output using Ant
task.shortdesc: You can use Ant scripts to call the XSLT scripts and provide parameters for the transformations.

step.cmd: Create a Ant script that contains targets for the output that you want to build.
From the command prompt, type the following string and press Enter:
step.info:
ant -f build_file targetwhere
-l log_file is a optional parameter that will log the X to log_file. By default, the X is displayed in the command-prompt window.
-f build_file is an optional parameter that specifies the Ant script. If you do not issue this parameter, Ant looks for a build.xml file in the current directory.
target is the name of the Ant target that you want to run.

link.desc: This is the documentation for Ant 1.7.1. In the navigation pane, click Ant TasksCore Tasks to view information about Ant tasks and their parameters.
